description:
`Onee-san` is http://anidb.net/ch18206 [Chico]`s older sister. She is tall, with dark-blue hair. After being seen masturbating by the boys through a crack in the ceiling, she is the indirect cause of their experimentation. She has a large collection of fetish outfits and sex toys that http://anidb.net/ch17562 [Pico] and Chico use without her permission. She later masturbates around a corner from the boys when she finds them sexually engaged upon returning from the grocery store.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Onee-san
